name: Tracer Bullet
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Firearms/Firearm Magic Items/Specific Firearm Ammunition/Tracer Bullet

Construction.Requirements: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, faerie fire

sections.body: These +1 firearm bullets deal no damage, but instead cause a pale glow to outline the target, granting the effect of a faerie fire spell and causing the target to take a –2 penalty to AC against ranged attacks. These effects last for 1d4 rounds.
sections.name: Description
